Climate Action.reason: The course explores "marine environment," "ocean currents," and "tide theory," which are fundamental components of the global climate system.

Life Below Water.reason: The course is centered on "hydrography," "marine environment," "marine hydrology," and "bathymetry," which are essential for understanding and managing marine ecosystems.
